title: bonitacrylic Kitty Kurlz Cat Toys, Magic Accordion Scratching Board, Interactive Organ Toy with One Ball, Enrichment Scratcher Mat for Kitten Bed Made of Cardboard Single Layer
features: 【Cat Scratcher Corrugated Paper】: High-quality environmentally friendly corrugated paper material, Honeycomb grid design, Built-in bell, there are various combinations, you can put the bell inside or outside to let your cat get much fun, and will not hurt his/her claws.
【EASY TO USE】: Round cat accordion scratcher can be used singly or in multiple splices. Magic organ cat scratcher with ball can be repeatedly disassembled.

【Magic Organ Cat Scratching Board】: The cat scratcher has a channel with a small ball in, your cat can nudge with its nose or shove with its paw. Cat toy balls will roll around the track without falling out, keeping your cats occupied and entertained.
【Protect Furniture】: The Organ shape can be used as a bed for sleeping or can be scratched freely so that cats will no longer destroy the furniture.
【NOTE】: A single circle stretchy cat scratcher will be suitable for cats under 10 pounds, for cats over 10 pounds, you will need to buy double for splicing.
description: Product Description Bonitacrylic is a brand dedicated to providing high-quality, durable, and stylish pet products that ensure the comfort and well-being of your pets. Bonitacrylic is a trusted brand specializing in premium pet products designed to meet the diverse needs of your pets. With a strong focus on quality, functionality, and aesthetic appeal, we aim to enhance the lives of pets and their owners alike. Our products are crafted with attention to detail, using durable materials to ensure longevity and safety. Whether it's grooming tools, pet furniture, or accessories, BonitaAcrylic strives to provide stylish solutions that contribute to your pet's happiness and health. The Catcordion Cat Scratching Toy is made from premium corrugated paper, featuring a honeycomb design that is both encrypted and thickened for added durability. This interactive cat toy offers tight, strong gaps that ensure a safe scratching experience for your cat, promoting healthy claws without causing damage. Perfect as both a cat scratcher and an engaging playtime activity, it's designed to withstand extended use while providing hours of fun for your feline friend. The magnets in the Kitty Kurlz cat toy allow you to easily connect multiple components, creating a large, interactive cat tunnel that’s perfect for families with multiple cats. This versatile toy not only provides endless entertainment but also doubles as a cat scratcher, promoting healthy claw care while your cats explore, play, and scratch. With Kitty Kurlz, your cats can enjoy hours of fun, exercise, and mental stimulation in one engaging toy. Another fantastic feature of the Kitty Kurlz cat toy is its ability to connect two cat scratching mats using powerful magnets, forming a larger, more exciting play structure. This innovative design enhances the fun and interactive experience for your cats, providing them with even more space to scratch, explore, and enjoy. Perfect as cat accessories for indoor cats, the Kitty Kurlz offers both entertainment and functionality, promoting healthy claws while keeping your cats engaged for hours. The Cat cordion Magic Cat Scratching Board features strong high-pressure bonding, making it highly durable and resistant to deformation, ensuring it’s safe for your cats to scratch without worry. Designed with a built-in round bell ball at the center, it provides a delightful jingle as it rolls, adding an extra layer of fun to your cat's playtime. This versatile cat toy serves as both a scratching board and a lounge, offering your cats a comfortable space to scratch, play, and relax. Ideal for promoting healthy claws while keeping your cats entertained for hours. Perfect for indoor cats, this multi-functional accessory will quickly become a favourite in your home.
